scripts.build:js: NODE_ENV=production haul bundle --platform ios --dev false --minimize true --entry-file js/index.ios.js --bundle-output assets/js/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest assets/res/
scripts.build:meta: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | sed 's/[",	 ]//g' | awk -F: '{ print "Bundle Version: " $2 }' > assets/js/index.ios.bundle.meta
